title: Return Policy
snippet: We accept returns within 30 days for unopened items with receipt. Opened electronics may incur a restocking fee. Faulty products are covered under manufacturer warranty. Please bring proof of purchase.

title: Extended Warranty
snippet: We offer extended warranty plans up to 3 years on TVs, refrigerators, and washing machines. Coverage includes parts and labor for mechanical or electrical failure. Ask our staff to see pricing and plan options.

title: BHB_Chatbot_Knowledgebase.json
snippet:
bhb_company_001 info company_profile Who is Ban Hin Bee (BHB)? Ban Hin Bee Sdn Bhd (BHB) is a home electrical and appliance retailer based in Northern Malaysia. Founded in 1961, it has grown from a single family-run shop into a multi-outlet retail chain with both physical showrooms and an e-commerce store at BHB.com.my. BHB focuses on trusted, branded home appliances with professional advice, delivery and after-sales support.
bhb_company_002 info brand_promise What is BHB's brand promise? BHB positions itself as 'Your Trusted Electrical Store' in Northern Malaysia. The promise is to offer genuine products from reputable brands, fair and transparent pricing, honest recommendations based on customer needs, and reliable after-sales support including delivery, installation coordination and war
